In this study, the health risk of PM 2.5 was evaluated using the long-term risk assessment value recommended by the World Health Organization (WHO). With reference to the assessment method of the WHO, the health risk of residents was assessed using the PM 2.5 concentration obtained and the current status of population distribution.
